content: Are there any specific reasons for having only one out of all tests, and none out of all validators, where the diameter is an even number? (Not asking you to change anything as many players have solved the puzzle already.)

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Easy puzzle, that can be funny to code.

I think a problem is how to determine when a crop is in a circle or not. It is not defined in your statement.

I consider that the coordinates are the coordinates of the center of the crop and that a crop is in the circle if its center is in, it's work but I don't know if it is "obvious" for all.

FYI to Everybody:
If you enjoy this one, please consider reviewing (comment/up-vote/approve) a simplified version of it I did called "Biscuit Cutter" at
https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/24766673175cf78a4f8547c6d5f157d74424a

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Well, I don't really like ASCII art, but this was another great one!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Clear description, many different tests, original (even if in the same line of the retro typewriter art one), of appropriate difficulty, aand quite fun !

I would suggest to remove the "Being of use to Aliens" tag though, it's just clutter.

Goal section
* Please change "convention are" to "convention is".
* Please use the full forms of words:
"integer" instead of "int".
"column" instead of "col".

Input section
* Suggest to change "telling info about" to "describing" (not an issue really, it just feels simpler and cleaner).

Constraints section
* Suggest to add "printed" or "displayed" before "fully".
* Both the second and last constraints should be moved to the Output section.

Thanks.

Thank you so much, 5DN1L.  You are very good at this!!

I fully did most of your suggestions except for the last two:

I didn't add "printed" or "displayed" before "fully" because a spot in the Farming-Field might be mowed, then planted, then mowed, then planted, etc before being actually printed or displayed at the end.

I put the part about how the circle could overflow the Farming-Field to the Goals section instead of Output section because that has to be dealt with long before Outputting.  

Please let me know any additional feedback.  Thanks again.

Thank you very much.  Yes, I do seem to be developing a "style" 

You're probably right in your last suggestion .  But you'll be sorry later if you don't develop skills the aliens find valuable ;)

Thank you so much.  
Yes, I seem to enjoy experimenting with the genre of "ASCII art" and making it do stuff it really shouldn't be doing :)
Thank you very much for the approval.
Because it's kinda ugly when the diameter is even.  It results in something that really doesn't look like a nice circle.

Many thanks to you too!

"fully is an adverb, so I think it should be at least changed to "full".
